text.div: I have read and understood InteropEHRate's Privacy Policy.\n\nI hereby give permission to the recipient S-EHR Cloud provider to store the personal data stored in my encrypted Personal Health Record on this S-EHR Cloud for the purpose of backup. I understand that my consent will remain valid for these purposes unless I affirmatively withdraw it. I have the right to withdraw this consent at any time.

coding.display: Patient Consent to store data on S-EHR Cloud
